title: Fish and chips
description: You can't beat  homemade fish & chips, get perfect results with Jo Pratt's easy fish supper - a classic British favourite
ingredients: beef dripping or oil, for deep frying (beef dripping is used in the traditional method and gives a far better flavour, but sunflower or vegetable oil will work just as well)
4x175g/6oz thick cod or haddock fillets, taken from the head end rather than the tail end of the fish
225g/8oz self-raising flour, plus extra for dusting
salt and freshly ground black pepper
6-8 large floury potatoes, such as maris piper, king edward, desiree (depending on how hungry you are)
